task.title: Publish a Story
task.shortdesc: Publish a Storify 2 to your site.

context.p: Studio will automatically save your App after any change is made to its configuration options.
context.note: Clicking Publish generates an embed code for the App, and updates all existing instances of the App if previously published.

step.cmd: Click Publish to generate an embed code, or to update any previously published versions of this App with the current version.
Add the embed code to your page to add the App and display any previously published content.
